download.title: Get the BXFinance App
download.content: A faster, easier way to access all your accounts from anywhere.

confirmation.title: We've Created Your Account
confirmation.content:
You can now access your BXFinance accounts online.

Here's all the things you can do:

  • Access Account Activity
  • Pay Bills and Transfer Money between your accounts and others.
  • Send and receive money from other people.
  • Make transactions for your banking, credit, loan, and investment accounts.

Tap Learn More to see all the things you can do, or just get started â€¨by signing in.
